txt.en: The Woodmen stranded in the Rushgore are in need of provisions and supplies to see them through their ordeal until they can patch their boats.

'[placeholder] from afar, will you give us aid? Our food-stores are low and the boats need patching. I have seen great turtles throughout this marsh from which we might obtain sustaining meat, as well as tough hides and shell fragments which we could use to patch the boats and perhaps fashion items to trade.

'Will you help us by hunting the turtles? Bring me meat for our stores, as well as hides and shells, and I will find the means to reward you.

'Thank you for your kindness, [placeholder].'
Turtles can be found throughout the Rushgore.\n\nFrogildi asked you to hunt the turtles of the Rushgore for their meat, hides, and shells.
Frogildi is at the Woodman camp in the heart of the Rushgore.\n\nYou should bring the items you collected to Frogildi.
'Have you collected enough turtle-meat, hides, and shells yet?'
Bring the turtle-meat, hides, and shells to Frogildi at the Woodman camp in the Rushgore.
